item.title: One shot retrieval of TLS certificates from Kubernetes
item.description: I believe that I am not only one who needed to get a secret value out of kubernetes. Usual advice focus on use of kubectl with json output and/or jsonpath. Problem is - the kubectl jsonpath is limited thus result needs to be scanned further by jq. It works, but jq is not part of everyone’s working environment.
